00024 // Marketing-driven product version
00025 #define TBB_VERSION_MAJOR 2
00026 #define TBB_VERSION_MINOR 1
00027

00030 #define TBB_INTERFACE_VERSION_MAJOR TBB_INTERFACE_VERSION/1000
00031

00033 // To be used in SONAME, manifests, etc.

00043 // Define groups for Doxygen documentation
00053 // Simple text that is displayed on the main page of Doxygen documentation.
00095 // Define preprocessor symbols used to determine architecture
00096 #if _WIN32||_WIN64
00097 #   if defined(_M_AMD64)
00098 #       define __TBB_x86_64 1
00099 #   elif defined(_M_IA64)
00100 #       define __TBB_ipf 1
00101 #   elif defined(_M_IX86)
00102 #       define __TBB_x86_32 1
00103 #   endif
00104 #else /* Assume generic Unix */
00105 #   if !__linux__ && !__APPLE__
00106 #       define __TBB_generic_os 1
00107 #   endif
00108 #   if __x86_64__
00109 #       define __TBB_x86_64 1
00110 #   elif __ia64__
00111 #       define __TBB_ipf 1
00112 #   elif __i386__||__i386  // __i386 is for Sun OS
00113 #       define __TBB_x86_32 1
00114 #   else
00115 #       define __TBB_generic_arch 1
00116 #   endif
00117 #endif
00118 
00119 #if _WIN32||_WIN64
00120 // define the parts of stdint.h that are needed, but put them inside tbb::internal
00121 namespace tbb {
00122 namespace internal {
00123     typedef __int8 int8_t;
00124     typedef __int16 int16_t;
00125     typedef __int32 int32_t;
00126     typedef __int64 int64_t;
00127     typedef unsigned __int8 uint8_t;
00128     typedef unsigned __int16 uint16_t;
00129     typedef unsigned __int32 uint32_t;
00130     typedef unsigned __int64 uint64_t;
00131 } // namespace internal
00132 } // namespace tbb
00133 #else
00134 #include <stdint.h>
00135 #endif

00142 #define __TBB_EXPORTED_METHOD
00143 #endif

00187 namespace tbb {
00189     typedef void(*assertion_handler_type)( const char* filename, int line, const char* expression, const char * comment );
00190 }
00191 
00192 #if TBB_USE_ASSERT
00193 
00195 
00198 #define __TBB_ASSERT(predicate,message) ((predicate)?((void)0):tbb::assertion_failure(__FILE__,__LINE__,#predicate,message))
00199 #define __TBB_ASSERT_EX __TBB_ASSERT
00200 
00201 namespace tbb {
00203     assertion_handler_type __TBB_EXPORTED_FUNC set_assertion_handler( assertion_handler_type new_handler );
00204 
00206 
00209     void __TBB_EXPORTED_FUNC assertion_failure( const char* filename, int line, const char* expression, const char* comment );
00210 } // namespace tbb
00211 
00212 #else
00213 
00215 #define __TBB_ASSERT(predicate,comment) ((void)0)
00216 
00217 #define __TBB_ASSERT_EX(predicate,comment) ((void)(1 && (predicate)))
00218 
00219 #endif /* TBB_USE_ASSERT */

00255 template<typename T>
00256 inline void poison_pointer( T* & p ) {
00257     p = reinterpret_cast<T*>(-1);
00258 }
00259 #else
00260 template<typename T>
00261 inline void poison_pointer( T* ) {/*do nothing*/}
00262 #endif /* TBB_USE_ASSERT */

00265 class no_copy {
00267     no_copy( const no_copy& );
00268 
00269     // Deny assignment
00270     void operator=( const no_copy& );
00271 public:
00273     no_copy() {}
00274 };
